articles.title: Virat Kohli Set To Miss White-Ball Series Against South Africa – Reports - Times Now
articles.description: Star Indian batter Virat Kohli, who was on fire in the ODI World Cup 2023, is set to miss the T20I and ODI series against South Africa next month. According to reports, the 35-year-old has taken a break from white-ball cricket and will only be available for t…
